channel.name: Create-Demographics

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Create Demographics
com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.script:
logger.info("Initiating create demographics..."); responseMap.put('result',msg); var fhir = new fhirObj().init("cerner","R4",msg.token); var Payload = "{
" + " "identifier": "PAT101",
" + " "name": {
" + " "given": "Sahils",
" + " "family": "Khannas",
" + " "middle": "sks"
" + " },
" + " "telecom": "(555) 675 5745",
" + " "gender": "male",
" + " "birthDate": "1991-01-01",
" + " "address": {
" + " "line1": "Street name, number, direction & P.O. Box etc.",
" + " "city": "Name of city, town etc.",
" + " "state": "TX",
" + " "country": "US",
" + " "zipCode": "900001"
" + " }
" + "}"; responseMap.put('createPatient',fhir.createPatient(Payload));

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
